root.name: TOCA Race Driver 3
root.description: OverviewToCA Race Driver 3 is a racing simulator developed by Codemasters. As its name indicates, the game is the third instalment in the Race Driver series of games - a franchise perhaps more famous for its most recent title, GRID. Touted as "the ultimate racing simulator", the game boasts over 70 licensed race cars and 35 different championships across six racing disciplines, and 40 real-world race track locations.Car
